## Week 1: October 5
Getting started with R/Rstudio, dplyr, and ggplot (oh my!)

### Reading

*Concepts* 

* Alberto Cairo. 2016. The Truthful Art: Data, Charts, and Maps for Communication. New Riders. [Chapter 1](https://search.lib.virginia.edu/sources/uva_library/items/u8545323)
* Claus O. Wilke. 2019. Fundamentals of Data Visualization. O’Reilly. [Chapter 1](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/introduction.html), [Chapter 2](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/aesthetic-mapping.html)

*Practice*
